lead_paragraph: The National Transportation Safety Board asked tech companies to add the locations of grade crossings into digital maps and to provide alerts for drivers.

headline.print_headline: Rail Crossing Warnings Sought for Mapping Apps
headline.main: Rail Crossing Warnings Are Sought for Mapping Apps

snippet: The National Transportation Safety Board asked tech companies to add the locations of grade crossings into digital maps and to provide alerts for drivers....
abstract: National Transportation Safety Board recommends technology and delivery companies add exact coordinates of over 200,000 so-called grade crossings on digital maps, following conclusion of investigation of accident involving commuter train and stuck truck at California crossing in 2015; accuracy of mapping data is becoming increasingly important as more drivers come to rely on digital maps, and with emergent technology such as driverless cars.
